synopsis.text: With Japan saved from imminent destruction, Akira Takizawa vanishes, leaving behind a cryptic message for Saki Morimi that hints at their initial meeting place. This clue propels Saki on a transcontinental journey to New York City, where she hopes to reunite with her missing friend. Meanwhile, the remaining Seleção, armed with substantial funds and driven by their individual ambitions, are also in pursuit of Akira. Some are eager to assist him in his quest to become the 'King of Japan,' while others harbor more sinister intentions, aiming to eliminate him to realize their own vision of an ideal Japan. As the stakes escalate, the game persists, weaving a thrilling narrative of power, ambition, and survival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
